actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A resolution celebrating Volunteers in Service to America on its 45th anniversary and recognizing its contribution to the fight against poverty.
subjects: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

summary.text: Commends those who have served in Volunteers in Service to America (VISTA) for their dedication and commitment to the fight against poverty.Recognizes VISTA members for leveraging human, financial, and material resources to increase the ability of thousands of low-income areas across the country to address challenges and improve their communities.Encourages the continued commitment of VISTA members to creating and expanding programs designed to bring individuals and communities out of poverty.

titles.title: A resolution celebrating Volunteers in Service to America on its 45th anniversary and recognizing its contribution to the fight against poverty.
